name: memparam
short_description: Full parameter test of x86 CPU's memory subsystem, including L1/L2 cache size/block size/association/write policy, L1/L2/memory bandwidth, BTB depth, RAS depth, TLB size/association and more. Best for architecture understanding purpose.
